statement_html:
Determine if the following equation is exact or not, and in either case, find the general solution:

\(\displaystyle ydx + (x^{2}y - x)dy = 0 \quad x > 0\)
statement_latex:
Determine if the following equation is exact or not, and in either case,
find the general solution:

$\displaystyle ydx + (x^{2}y - x)dy = 0 \quad x > 0$
statement_raw:
Determine if the following equation is exact or not, and in either case, find the general
solution:

<math> \displaystyle ydx + (x^{2}y - x)dy = 0 \quad x > 0 </math>
